hero.title: Play Live Online Games with {website.name}
hero.subtitle: Join the excitement of live online gaming on {website.name}. Compete with players in {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}, host your own sessions, or jump into real-time multiplayer action.

joinGames.title: Join or Host Live Games
joinGames.description: Get in the game with {website.name}’s live gaming platform. Whether you’re a player or a host, our tools make it easy to connect and compete in real-time. Sign up below to start your gaming journey.

form.title: Sign Up for Live Games
form.subtitle: Fill out the form to join or host a live gaming session on {website.name}.

steps.title: Create Your Account
steps.description: Sign up for free on {website.name} to access our live gaming platform and join the community.

steps.title: Choose Your Game
steps.description: Select from popular live games like Fortnite, Among Us, or Valorant, and join or host sessions.

steps.title: Play and Compete
steps.description: Jump into real-time matches, collaborate with players, and track your progress with {website.name} tools.

items.title: Fortnite
items.description: Join millions in Epic’s battle royale. Compete in live matches and aim for Victory Royale on {website.name}.

items.title: Among Us
items.description: Team up or deceive as a crewmate or impostor in this thrilling multiplayer game, live on {website.name}.

items.title: Valorant
items.description: Test your aim and strategy in 5v5 live matches. Play with friends or compete globally on {website.name}.
